name: Your Hand Is A Glove
description:
An evil scientist :( is studying a young boy with the power of seeing through
solid objects, but an unexpected friend is going to help him :)

WASD:  move.

Arrow Left and Right:  hold to turn the world inside out like a glove, release to go  back  to normal.

E: interact.

Esc: quit.

Enter: lock/unlock mouse

A 5 min game made for unexpectedjam, enjoy!

Music (copyright free): 126ers - Rage
